description: This file is a Python source code file that sets up and demonstrates usage of the Gemini model with Vertex AI, including environment variable instructions, class instantiation, and method calls related to an agent for generating responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with a model to generate responses.

classes.name: RunResponse
classes.description: A class representing the response from running the agent.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A class representing the Gemini model configured to use Vertex AI.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to print the agent's response to the terminal.
